home.howItWorksParagraph: If you are a business owner and I applied to service, we work on the receipt of the request from your store to your client directly, and if you are the captain of the shopping we give you the opportunity to work part-time with us on-site at the right time for you to connect the privileged.
home.missionParagraph: Committed to delivering all orders in accordance with the latest regulations and very precisely in the period of delivery be part of the success story of the client, until the demand perfectly.
home.visionParagraph: To have Sender, one of the pioneers of connectivity in the world starting from Saudi Arabia and the Middle East and even to get into all countries of the world in the field of delivery, an obligation by providing the best technologies and precision-every professional, until the demand perfectly.

faq.paragraph1: There is an integrated platform made up of a website and a mobile app (IOS & Android)
faq.paragraph2: If the business owner owns an application or platform, the platform or application is linked through databases with the Cender platform. Via API or Application Programming Interface
faq.heading3: What Is In The Business Owners Account?
faq.paragraph3: The platform has accurate reports on the number of shipments, delivery, delivery times and places of delivery in order to help the business owner in making future decisions and thus contribute to the development of his business
faq.heading4: How Can Sender Be Part Of An Employer's Success Story
faq.paragraph4: Sender can provide services outside the scope of delivery, for example, special additions to the delivery platform through the website, at the request of the business owner himself
faq.heading5: How Do I Protect My Copyrights With Sender?
faq.paragraph5: In the event that the shipment is not delivered, the delivery price for the shipment is deducted, and some administrative measures are taken through the customer service department so that the same error is not repeated
faq.paragraph6: There are several options that Sender offers to clients. Scheduled orders, express orders, and express shipping service
faq.heading7: How To Facilitate The Work Stream For Business Owners?
faq.paragraph7: Sender offers a turnkey solution for e-commerce organizations and business owners, as it facilitates the delivery process and allows you to focus on marketing, sales and storage. We can also connect you with other technical services such as warehousing and inventory management and provide technical services such as linking business owners with e-commerce platforms and providing your electronic application services.
